entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
